title: Harriet Harman – 2011 Speech to Labour Party Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Harriet Harman, the Deputy Leader of the Labour Party, to Labour Party conference on 26th September 2011.
content:
[![harrietharman](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/harrietharman.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/harrietharman.jpg)
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations

Thank you, Maryan, for coming to our conference. There can be no end to the suffering in Somalia without an end to the conflict.
